#summary The dd element represents a definition or value.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *dd element*

== Usage ==

Within a [DlElement definition list], `dd` represents a definition or value.

Within a [DialogElement dialog], `dd` represents a quote as part of a conversation.

== Attributes ==

  * [DdAlignAttribute align]
  * [DdClearAttribute clear]
  * [DdHeightAttribute height]
  * [DdNowrapAttribute nowrap]
  * [DdWidthAttribute width]
  * [CommonAttributes common attributes]
